hero.title: Where Learning Meets Fun
hero.subtitle: Discover free educational games designed to make learning engaging and effective for students aged 6-18.

footer.description: EduGameHQ is your go-to platform for educational games that make learning engaging and effective.

math_games.title: Math Games
math_games.description: Explore our collection of engaging math games designed to make learning mathematics fun and interactive. From basic arithmetic to advanced problem-solving, these games help students build confidence and skills in mathematics.

featured_section.title: Featured Math Games
featured_section.description: Our most popular and recommended math games

easy.title: Easy Level Games
easy.description: Perfect for beginners and young learners

learning_tips.title: Math Learning Tips
learning_tips.subtitle: Expert advice to improve your math skills

tips.title: Practice Daily
tips.description: Spend 15-20 minutes daily practicing math concepts through games

tips.title: Progress Gradually
tips.description: Start with easier games and gradually move to more challenging ones

tips.title: Embrace Mistakes
tips.description: Don't be afraid to make mistakes - they're part of the learning process

tips.title: Understand Why
tips.description: Focus on understanding the reasoning behind each solution

language_games.title: Language Games
language_games.description: Improve your language skills with our collection of engaging word games, vocabulary builders, and reading comprehension activities.

easy.title: Easy Level Games
easy.description: Perfect for beginners and young learners

learning_tips.title: Language Learning Tips

puzzle_games.title: Puzzle Games
puzzle_games.description: Challenge your mind with our collection of educational puzzle games! Develop critical thinking, problem-solving skills, logic, and spatial reasoning through engaging brain teasers and mind-bending challenges.

featured_section.title: Featured Puzzle Games
featured_section.description: Mind-bending puzzles to challenge your thinking skills

easy.title: Easy Level Games
easy.description: Perfect for beginners and young puzzle solvers

hard.title: Hard Level Games
hard.description: Advanced puzzles for master problem solvers

learning_tips.title: Puzzle Solving Tips
learning_tips.subtitle: Strategies to improve your problem-solving skills

about.title: About EduGameHQ
about.subtitle: Where Learning Meets Fun - Transforming Education Through Interactive Gaming
about.company_subtitle: Making quality education accessible, engaging, and enjoyable for every child

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize quality education by providing free, engaging, and effective educational games that inspire curiosity, foster creativity, and build essential skills for the 21st century.
mission.vision_description: A world where every child has access to high-quality educational content that makes learning joyful, meaningful, and transformative.

quality_first.title: Quality First
quality_first.description: Every game is carefully curated and tested by education experts

always_free.title: Always Free
always_free.description: Education should be accessible to everyone, everywhere

safe_environment.title: Safe Environment
safe_environment.description: Child-friendly content with strict safety and privacy standards

global_reach.title: Global Reach
global_reach.description: Supporting learners worldwide with multilingual content

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: EduGameHQ was born from a simple observation: children learn best when they're having fun. Founded in 2023 by a team of educators, game developers, and child psychologists, we set out to bridge the gap between entertainment and education.

growth.title: Growth & Expansion
growth.description: What started as a small collection of math games has grown into a comprehensive platform serving over 50,000 students worldwide. Our games cover mathematics, science, coding, language arts, and critical thinking skills.

today.title: Today & Beyond
today.description: Today, EduGameHQ continues to evolve, always guided by our core belief that quality education should be free, accessible, and enjoyable for every child.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.intro: Our diverse team of educators, developers, and researchers work together to create the best possible learning experience for students worldwide.

sarah_chen.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
sarah_chen.description: Former Stanford professor with 15+ years in educational technology

alex_thompson.description: Full-stack developer passionate about accessible education

contact_cta.description: We'd love to hear from you! Contact us for partnerships, feedback, or just to say hello.

curriculum_aligned.title: Curriculum-Aligned
curriculum_aligned.description: Games designed by educators to support learning objectives

safe_environment.title: Safe Environment
safe_environment.description: Kid-friendly, ad-filtered content with privacy protection

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform
cross_platform.description: Works on any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile

no_downloads.title: No Downloads
no_downloads.description: Instant play in your browser - no installation required

how_it_works.title: How EduGameHQ Works
how_it_works.description: Simple steps to start your learning adventure

step1.title: 1. Explore Games
step1.description: Browse by category, age, or subject to find your perfect game.

step2.title: 2. Choose & Play
step2.description: Select any game you like and start playing instantly in your browser.

step3.title: 3. Learn & Grow
step3.description: Enjoy fun gameplay that reinforces key academic concepts.

parent1.text: EduGameHQ has transformed my child's attitude towards math. He now looks forward to learning!
parent1.author: Sarah L., Parent

teacher1.text: An invaluable resource for my classroom. The games are both fun and academically rigorous.
teacher1.author: Mr. David K., Teacher

parent2.text: My daughter's reading skills have improved dramatically thanks to the engaging language games.
parent2.author: Emily R., Parent

science.title: Science Games
science.description: Explore the wonders of science with interactive games covering physics, chemistry, biology, and earth sciences. Perfect for curious minds and future scientists who want to discover how the world works through hands-on experimentation and observation.

featured.title: Featured Science Games
featured.subtitle: Our most popular and recommended science games

easy.title: Easy Level Games
easy.subtitle: Perfect for beginners and young scientists

medium.title: Medium Level Games
medium.subtitle: Challenge yourself with intermediate scientific concepts

learning_tips.title: Science Learning Tips
learning_tips.subtitle: Expert advice to improve your scientific thinking

observe.title: Observe Everything
observe.description: Pay attention to the world around you and ask "why" and "how"

experiment.title: Experiment Safely
experiment.description: Test your hypotheses through controlled experiments and observations

journal.title: Keep a Science Journal
journal.description: Record your observations, questions, and discoveries

connect.title: Connect to Real Life
connect.description: Link scientific concepts to everyday events and experiences

core_skills.title: Core Skills You'll Develop
core_skills.subtitle: Essential scientific abilities gained through gameplay
